name: multiplatform-testing
shortDescription: A Gradle plugin to ease testing in multiplatform projects, with a focus on Android and Android Native targets. Locates and downloads SDK packages, configures emulators and more, invaluable on CI.
longDescription: A Gradle plugin to ease testing in multiplatform projects, with a focus on Android and Android Native targets. Locates and downloads SDK packages, configures emulators and more, invaluable on CI.
